episodes.title: A 16-Year-Old Girl Has To Escape An FLDS Cult To Avoid Becoming A Child Bride - Sweet Molly
episodes.description:
Sweet Molly – The Haunting, Award-Winning Short Film About Escaping a Cult

"Everything else goes on the shelf."

At 16, Molly, born and raised in the Fundamentalist Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints (FLDS) cult, makes a chilling discovery through her ability to astral project, leading to a life-altering event.

Winner of several awards and official selection at FilmQuest, Flickers' Rhode Island (semi-finalist), Venice Shorts, Hollywood Shortfest, SIMI Film Fest, Utah Film Festival, Desertscape, Culver City Film Festival, Kanab Film Festival, Next Step Cannes, and Zepstone International Film and Music Festival.

Watch if you enjoy:
Hereditary, Saint Maud, The Handmaid’s Tale, The Witch, or Midsommar.
